articles.author: ET Spotlight Special
articles.title: NEET 2022: Dress code rules issued; long-sleeved clothes, shoes not allowed
articles.description: Moreover, no ornaments or metallic items will be allowed in the exam hall. For instance, do not wear watches, any type of cameras, bracelets, etc. to the exam. Similarly, items like caps, goggles, belts, wallets, handbags, etc won’t be allowed.
articles.content:
As per NEET 2022 Dress Code, candidates cannot wear long-sleeved clothes, jewellery, shoes, belts, goggles, or caps, to the exam venue. This step has been taken to prevent cheating.
The National Eli… [+1761 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Ganguly wins Fischer Random event at Biel Chess Festival
articles.description: Indian Grandmaster Surya Sekhar Ganguly on Tuesday emerged winner in the Fischer Random event at Biel Chess Festival with compatriot SP Sethuraman finishing in second place.
articles.content:
Played my first ever Fischer random tournament and won @BielFestival. #Champion #Biel #Switzerland #Chess https://t.co/QoWwtKVeVP
— Surya Sekhar Ganguly (@suryachess64) 1657613308000
